column4: [notice caught SIGWINCH, shutting down gracefully  I'm getting that in my Apache error log, and nothing works. Anyone know how I can fix this?
semingly nothing. It was running perfectly for almost a year, then it went down earlier, and this is what I'm getting.
-> anyone was hitting your apache when it broke or just out of the blue?
I was browsing some forums I host when it started.
-> wait a second, browsing some forums?  that is not your apache server, it is someone else at the remote site.. am confused
it's my server, I host some forums that I was looking at.
-> okay, did you bring snacks? am hungry..lol
-> about that sigwinch?  i think gnutron is correct about that
I wasn't web browsing on the server, it's headless and CLI only.
and the error reoccurs every time I try to start my website
-> umm can you post in pastebin the logs of apache or perhaps ask the nice folks at #apache to help troubleshoot?
logs'll be hard right now, but I'll ask in apache.
